<script async="" defer="" src="https://accounts.google.com/gsi/client"></script>
<script async="" src="https://news.google.com/swg/js/v1/swg.js" subscriptions-control="manual"></script>
<script async="" src="https://news.google.com/swg/js/v1/swg-gaa.js"></script>
<script src="https://accounts.google.com/gsi/client"></script>
<script>
    console.log("Executing Google One Tap Login");
    const waitTimeForZephrLoadInWindowInMs = 2000;
    const makeXMLHttpRequestGoogleOTL = (method, url, data, done) => {
        const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
        xhr.open(method, url);
        if (method === "POST") {
            xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-type", "application/json");
            xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
        }
        if (done) {
            xhr.onload = function () {
                done(xhr.status, xhr.response);
            };
            xhr.onerror = function () {
                done(xhr.status, null);
            };
        }

        return !data ? xhr.send() : xhr.send(data);
    };

    function loginWithZephrPlugin(response) {
        const idToken = response.credential;
        console.log(idToken);
        makeXMLHttpRequestGoogleOTL(
            "POST",
            "https://www.washingtonexaminer.com/plugins/public/google-one-tap-login/otl",
            JSON.stringify({ token: idToken }),
            function (status, res) {
                console.log(res);
                if (Number(status) === 200) {
                    res = JSON.parse(res);

                    var cookieParts = res.cookie.split("; ");
                    var blaizeSession;
                    var expires;

                    for (var i = 0; i < cookieParts.length; i++) {
                        var keyValue = cookieParts[i].split("=");
                        var key = keyValue[0].trim();
                        var value = keyValue[1];
                        if (key === "blaize_session") {
                            blaizeSession = value;
                        } else if (key === "Expires") {
                            expires = value;
                        }
                    }

                    document.cookie = "blaize_session=; Path=/; Expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:01 GMT";
                    document.cookie = `blaize_session=${blaizeSession}; Expires=${expires}; Path=/; Domain=www.washingtonexaminer.com;`;
                }
                location.reload();
            }
        );
    }

    window.onGoogleLibraryLoad = () => {
    if (window.location.pathname !== '/subscribe/digital/') {
        setTimeout(function () {
            if (!window.Zephr.accessDetails.isAuthenticated) {
                google.accounts.id.initialize({
                    client_id: "631840175966-t7oedl3k5h0much3s33f7lq7bg4b231q.apps.googleusercontent.com",
                    cancel_on_tap_outside: false,
                    callback: loginWithZephrPlugin,
                    prompt_parent_id: "root",
                    // intermediate_iframe_close_callback: close_callback1
                });

                google.accounts.id.prompt((notification) => {
                    if (notification.isNotDisplayed()) {
                        console.log(notification.getNotDisplayedReason());
                    } else if (notification.isSkippedMoment()) {
                        console.log(notification.getSkippedReason());
                    } else if (notification.isDismissedMoment()) {
                        console.log(notification.getDismissedReason());
                    } else {
                        // Handle other cases if necessary
                    }
                });
            }
        }, waitTimeForZephrLoadInWindowInMs);
    }
}

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    function waitForDataLayer(callback) {
        const interval = 100;
        const maxWaitTime = 5000;
        let elapsedTime = 0;

        const checkDataLayer = () => {
            if (typeof window.dataLayer !== 'undefined' && Array.isArray(window.dataLayer)) {
                callback();
            } else if (elapsedTime < maxWaitTime) {
                elapsedTime += interval;
                setTimeout(checkDataLayer, interval);
            } else {
                console.warn('dataLayer did not load within the timeout period.');
            }
        };

        checkDataLayer();
    }

    </script>
<script async="" src="//use1.production.ai.zephr.com/www.washingtonexaminer.com/SiteScript.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">

    const isAccessibleForFree = false;
    const articleId = "";
    const section = "News";

    function initializeCampaignScript() {
        // Check if Zephr is initialized
        if (typeof window.Zephr === "undefined" || typeof window.Zephr.accessDetails === "undefined") {
            setTimeout(initializeCampaignScript, 500);
            return;
        }

        // Validate dataLayer
        if (!window.dataLayer || !Array.isArray(window.dataLayer)) {
            return;
        }

        // Action ID mapping for better maintainability
        const ACTION_IDS = {
            PLAN_SELECT_CHANGE: 28,
            PURCHASE_SUCCESS: 151,
            LOGOUT: 115,
            REGISTER_SUCCESS: 71,
            FORM_RENDER: 44,
            DEFAULT: 21,
        };

        function getActionId(event) {
            let actionId = null;
            let value = "";
            let productInfo = [];

            if (event && event.event) {
                switch (event.event) {
                    case "zephr_form_section_change":
                        if (event.previousSectionId === "plan_select") {
                            actionId = ACTION_IDS.PLAN_SELECT_CHANGE;
                        }
                        break;

                    case "zephr_form_purchase":
                        actionId = ACTION_IDS.PURCHASE_SUCCESS;
                        if (typeof event.price === "number" && event.productId !== undefined) {
                            const priceInCents = Math.round(event.price * 100); // Convert price to cents
                            value = priceInCents;
                            productInfo = [
                                {
                                    product_name: event.productId || "Unknown Product",
                                    product_price: priceInCents,
                                },
                            ];
                        }
                        break;

                    case "zephr_form_device_logout":
                    case "zephr_form_sign_out_all_devices":
                        actionId = ACTION_IDS.LOGOUT;
                        break;

                    case "zephr_form_register":
                        if (event.success === true) {
                            actionId = ACTION_IDS.REGISTER_SUCCESS;
                        }
                        break;

                    case "zephr_form_render":
                        actionId = ACTION_IDS.FORM_RENDER;
                        break;

                    default:
                        break;
                }
            }

            return { actionId, value, productInfo };
        }

        function getDefaultActionId() {
            return ACTION_IDS.DEFAULT;
        }

        function getCountryCodeFromLocale() {
            const locale = (navigator && (navigator.language || navigator.userLanguage)) || "";

            if (!locale) return "GBR";

            const separator = locale.includes('-') ? '-' : (locale.includes('_') ? '_' : null);

            if (separator) {
                const parts = locale.split(separator);
                if (parts.length > 1) {
                    return parts[1].toUpperCase();
                }
            }
            return locale.toUpperCase();
        }

        function createAndSendCampaignInfo(actionId, value, productInfo, eventDescription = "Initial Payload") {
            if (!actionId) {
                return;
            }

            // Ensure ZITFunctions exists
            if (typeof window.ZITFunctions === "undefined") {
                return;
            }

            const userStatus = window.ZITFunctions.retrieveUserStatus();
            const userId = userStatus !== "anonymous" ? window.ZITFunctions.retrieveOrigSession() || "" : "";

            const campaignInfo = {
                brandId: window.ZITFunctions.brandId,
                action: actionId,
                actionValue: value === null || value === undefined || value === "" ? 0 : value,
                wId_2: [
                    window.Zephr?.outcomes?.article?.outcomeLabel || ""
                ],
                dtId: window.ZITFunctions.retrieveOrigSession(),
                refer: document.referrer,
                requestUrl: window.location.href,
                content: {
                    increaseRA: isAccessibleForFree, // Use the passed PHP variable here
                    articleId: articleId,
                    section: section,
                },
                user: {
                    userState: userStatus,
                    userId: userId,
                },
                context: {
                    countryCode: getCountryCodeFromLocale(),
                    accessDecision: "Fixed",
                    userAgent: navigator.userAgent,
                    referSource: document.referrer,
                    custom: {
                        variable_1: "Eric Adams drops out of New York City mayoral race",
                        variable_2: "",
                    },
                },
                product: productInfo || [],
            };


            if (typeof window.ZITFunctions.sendData === "function") {
                window.ZITFunctions.sendData(campaignInfo);
            } else {
                console.error("❌ sendData function is not defined.");
            }
        }

        function observeDataLayerChanges() {
            const originalPush = window.dataLayer.push;

            window.dataLayer.push = function (...events) {
                events.forEach(event => {
                    if (event && event.event) {

                        const { actionId, value, productInfo } = getActionId(event);
                        if (actionId !== null) {
                            createAndSendCampaignInfo(actionId, value, productInfo, `Event: ${event.event}`);
                        } else {
                            console.log(`Event`);
                        }
                    }
                });

                try {
                    originalPush.apply(this, arguments);
                } catch (error) {
                    console.error("Error pushing to dataLayer:", error);
                }
            };
        }

        observeDataLayerChanges();

        // Process existing events in dataLayer
        let initialActionId = null;
        let initialValue = "";
        let initialProductInfo = [];
        for (let i = window.dataLayer.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
            const event = window.dataLayer[i];
            const { actionId, value, productInfo } = getActionId(event);

            if (actionId !== null) {
                initialActionId = actionId;
                initialValue = value;
                initialProductInfo = productInfo;
                break;
            }
        }

        if (initialActionId !== null) {
            createAndSendCampaignInfo(initialActionId, initialValue, initialProductInfo, "Initial Payload");
        } else {
            const defaultActionId = getDefaultActionId();
            createAndSendCampaignInfo(defaultActionId, "", [], "Fallback Payload (Default ActionId)");
        }
    }

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
        initializeCampaignScript();
    });
</script>
<!-- Zephr DataLayer -->
<script type="text/javascript">
  document.addEventListener('zephr.browserDecisionsFinished', function() {
    window.Zephr = window.Zephr || {};
    window.Zephr.includeOutcomes = true;
    window.Zephr.outcomesAsEvents = true;
    window.Zephr.groupFields = true;

    (function() {
      var xhr = new(XMLHttpRequest || ActiveXObject)('MSXML2.XMLHTTP.3.0');
      xhr.open('GET', '/blaize/datalayer', true);
      xhr.onreadystatechange = function() {
        if (xhr.readyState === 4) {
          var response;
          try {
            response = JSON.parse(xhr.response);
          } catch (e) {
            response = xhr.response;
          }
          if (xhr.status === 200) {
            for (var dataLayerFieldName in response) {
              if (!(dataLayerFieldName in window)) window[dataLayerFieldName] = [];
              var pageView = response[dataLayerFieldName];
              var events = [];
              if (window.Zephr && window.Zephr.includeOutcomes && window.Zephr.outcomes) {
                pageView.zephrOutcomes = window.Zephr.outcomes;
                if (window.Zephr.outcomesAsEvents) {
                  Object.keys(window.Zephr.outcomes || []).forEach(function(outcomeKey) {
                    var outcomeEvent = {
                      event: "zephr-outcome-" + outcomeKey,
                      featureId: outcomeKey,
                      featureLabel: window.Zephr.outcomes[outcomeKey].featureLabel,
                      outcomeId: window.Zephr.outcomes[outcomeKey].outcomeId,
                      outcomeLabel: window.Zephr.outcomes[outcomeKey].outcomeLabel,
                    };
                    events.push(outcomeEvent);
                  });
                }
              }
              if (window.Zephr && window.Zephr.accessDetails) {
                Object.keys((window.Zephr.accessDetails.trials || {})).forEach(function(trialId) {
                  var trial = window.Zephr.accessDetails.trials[trialId]
                  if (trial.reportInDataLayer) {
                    var usedCredits = trial.totalCredits - trial.remainingCredits
                    if (window.Zephr.groupFields && !pageView.zephrTrials) pageView.zephrTrials = {};
                    var target = window.Zephr.groupFields ? pageView.zephrTrials : pageView
                    if (trial.dataLayerCreditsUsedKey) {
                      target[trial.dataLayerCreditsUsedKey] = usedCredits;
                    }
                    if (trial.dataLayerCreditsRemainingKey) {
                      target[trial.dataLayerCreditsRemainingKey] = trial.remainingCredits;
                    }
                  }
                });
                (window.Zephr.accessDetails.trialTrackingDetails || []).forEach(function(details) {
                  var type = details.entitlementType === 'credits' ? 'credits' : 'meters';
                  var trial = (window.Zephr.accessDetails[type] || {})[details.entitlementId];
                  if (!trial) return;
                  if (window.Zephr.groupFields && !pageView.zephrTrials) pageView.zephrTrials = {};
                  if (details.creditsRemainingKey) {
                    if (window.Zephr.groupFields) {
                      pageView.zephrTrials[details.creditsRemainingKey] = trial.remainingCredits;
                    } else {
                      pageView[details.creditsRemainingKey] = trial.remainingCredits;
                    }
                  }
                  if (details.creditsUsedKey) {
                    if (window.Zephr.groupFields) {
                      pageView.zephrTrials[details.creditsUsedKey] = trial.totalCredits - trial.remainingCredits;
                    } else {
                      pageView[details.creditsUsedKey] = trial.totalCredits - trial.remainingCredits;
                    }
                  }
                });
                try {
                  (Object.keys(window.Zephr.accessDetails.timeTrials || {})).forEach(function(timeTrialId) {
                    var timeTrial = window.Zephr.accessDetails.timeTrials[timeTrialId]
                    if (timeTrial.reportInDataLayer) {
                      if (window.Zephr.groupFields && !pageView.zephrTrials) pageView.zephrTrials = {};
                      var target = window.Zephr.groupFields ? pageView.zephrTrials : pageView
                      if (timeTrial.dataLayerTrialDurationKey) {
                        target[timeTrial.dataLayerTrialDurationKey] = timeTrial.trialDuration;
                      }
                      if (timeTrial.dataLayerTrialDurationUnitsKey) {
                        target[timeTrial.dataLayerTrialDurationUnitsKey] = timeTrial.trialDurationUnits;
                      }
                      if (timeTrial.dataLayerTrackerEntryTimeKey) {
                        target[timeTrial.dataLayerTrackerEntryTimeKey] = timeTrial.entryTime;
                      }
                      if (timeTrial.dataLayerTrackerHitsKey) {
                        target[timeTrial.dataLayerTrackerHitsKey] = timeTrial.trackerHits;
                      }
                      if (timeTrial.dataLayerTrialTimeRemainingKey) {
                        target[timeTrial.dataLayerTrialTimeRemainingKey] = timeTrial.timeRemainingInTrial;
                      }
                    }
                  });
                } catch (err) {
                  console.error("Error aggregating Zephr time trials", err);
                }
              }
              if (Object.keys(pageView).length) {
                pageView.event = "zephr-pageview";
                events.unshift(pageView);
              }
              if (!events.length) continue;
              events.forEach(function(event) {
                window[dataLayerFieldName].push(event);
              });
            }
            var readyEvent = document.createEvent('Event');
            readyEvent.initEvent('zephr.dataLayerReady', true, true);
            document.dispatchEvent(readyEvent);
          }
        }
      }
      xhr.send({});
    })();
  });
</script>
<!-- Zephr Datalayer End -->
